profileType.title: Profile Type
profileType.description: Select the Uber rides you want to collect. Either PERSONAL, BUSINESS or FAMILY.

getInvoices.script: fetch("https://riders.uber.com/graphql", {"headers": {"content-type": "application/json","x-csrf-token": "x"},"referrerPolicy": "strict-origin-when-cross-origin","body": "{\"operationName\":\"Activities\",\"variables\":{\"includePast\":true,\"includeUpcoming\":false,\"limit\":100,\"orderTypes\":[\"RIDES\",\"TRAVEL\"],\"profileType\":\"{{config.profileType}}\",\"cityID\":330},\"query\":\"query Activities($cityID: Int, $endTimeMs: Float, $includePast: Boolean = true, $includeUpcoming: Boolean = true, $limit: Int = 5, $nextPageToken: String, $orderTypes: [RVWebCommonActivityOrderType!] = [RIDES, TRAVEL], $profileType: RVWebCommonActivityProfileType = PERSONAL, $startTimeMs: Float) {\\n  activities(cityID: $cityID) {\\n    cityID\\n    past(\\n      endTimeMs: $endTimeMs\\n      limit: $limit\\n      nextPageToken: $nextPageToken\\n      orderTypes: $orderTypes\\n      profileType: $profileType\\n      startTimeMs: $startTimeMs\\n    ) @include(if: $includePast) {\\n      activities {\\n        ...RVWebCommonActivityFragment\\n        __typename\\n      }\\n      nextPageToken\\n      __typename\\n    }\\n    upcoming @include(if: $includeUpcoming) {\\n      activities {\\n        ...RVWebCommonActivityFragment\\n        __typename\\n      }\\n      __typename\\n    }\\n    __typename\\n  }\\n}\\n\\nfragment RVWebCommonActivityFragment on RVWebCommonActivity {\\n  cardURL\\n  description\\n  subtitle\\n  title\\n  uuid\\n  __typename\\n}\"}","method": "POST","mode": "cors","credentials": "include"}).then(res => res.json()).then(d => d.data.activities.past.activities)

forEach.script: fetch("https://riders.uber.com/graphql", {"headers": {"content-type": "application/json","x-csrf-token": "x"},"referrerPolicy": "strict-origin-when-cross-origin","body": JSON.stringify({query: `{ invoiceFiles(tripUUID: \"{{ride.uuid}}\") { files { downloadURL __typename } __typename } getTrip(tripUUID: \"{{ride.uuid}}\") { trip { uuid beginTripTime fare status } } }`}),"method": "POST","mode": "cors","credentials": "include"}).then(res => res.json()).then(res => (res?.data ? {id: res.data.getTrip.trip.uuid, invoiceUrl: res.data.invoiceFiles.files[0]?.downloadURL, date: res.data.getTrip.trip.beginTripTime, total: res.data.getTrip.trip.fare} : {}))
